1.1.name: wordpress/stocktwits
1.1.description:
The StockTwits plugin shows the most recent posts from http://www.StockTwits.com website as a widget. Choose to show your stock messages, just the Ticker stream, or the All stream. Show the messages in a post, in a theme, or as a widget.

It's pretty simple to run, just drop it in the plugin directory and activate. Then got to the Settings and configure the default plugin settings.

Then add it as a widget, theme code, or simple code method to your blog.
